item.title: Measuring the adiabatic Non-Hermitian Berry Phase in Feedback-Coupled Oscillators
item.description: In this talk I presented our most recent work at the University of Catania. It was the first time I ever presented my work! We measured for the first time the Berry phase in the case of a non-Hermitian Hamiltonian using a mechanical metamaterial.
